mapper.select: SELECT A.COM_CD AS comCd ,A.COM_UP_CD AS comUpCd ,A.CD_DESC1 AS cdDesc1 ,A.CD_DESC2 AS cdDesc2 ,A.USE_YN AS useYn ,A.DSP_ORD AS dspOrd ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDate ,B.MLANG_COM_CD_NAME AS comCdName FROM TB_SYS_COM_CD A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD B ON A.COM_CD = B.COM_CD WHERE A.COM_CD = #{comCd} AND B.LANG_CLS_CD = #{lang}

SELECT A.COM_CD AS comCd ,A.ADD_VAL1 AS addVal1 ,A.ADD_VAL2 AS addVal2 ,A.ADD_VAL3 AS addVal3 ,B.MLANG_COM_CD_NAME AS comCdName FROM TB_SYS_COM_CD A INNER JOIN TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD B ON A.COM_CD = B.COM_CD WHERE A.COM_UP_CD = #{comUpCd} AND B.LANG_CLS_CD = #{lang} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CAST(A.DSP_ORD AS UNSIGNED)

SELECT COM_CD AS comCd ,COM_UP_CD AS comUpCd ,CD_DESC1 AS cdDesc1 ,CD_DESC2 AS cdDesc2 ,USE_YN AS useYn ,DSP_ORD AS dspOrd ,ADD_VAL1 AS addVal1 ,ADD_VAL2 AS addVal2 ,ADD_VAL3 AS addVal3 FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD = #{comUpCd} ;
SELECT LANG_CLS_CD ,MLANG_COM_CD_NAME FROM TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = #{comCd}
SELECT COUNT(COM_CD) FROM TB_SYS_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD LIKE CONCAT(#{code},"%")
SELECT COUNT(COM_CD)+1 FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD IS NULL

SELECT A.STATION_GRP_SEQ AS stationId ,B.STATION_GRP_NAME AS stationName FROM spb.TB_OPR_STATION_GRP A INNER JOIN TB_OPR_MLANG_STATION_GRP B ON A.STATION_GRP_SEQ = B.STATION_GRP_SEQ WHERE B.LANG_CLS_CD = #{lang} ORDER BY A.STATION_GRP_SEQ

SELECT A.STATION_ID AS stationId ,B.STATION_NAME AS stationName FROM spb.TB_OPR_STATION A INNER JOIN spb.TB_OPR_MLANG_STATION B ON A.STATION_ID = B.STATION_ID WHERE A.STATION_GRP_SEQ = #{stationId} AND B.LANG_CLS_CD = #{lang} ORDER BY B.STATION_NAME
SELECT CENTER_ID AS centerId ,CENTER_NAME AS centerName FROM spb.TB_OPR_CENTER WHERE CENTER_CLS_CD IN ( 'CEN_001', 'CEN_002' )
SELECT REPLACE(CENTER_ID,'CEN','') AS centerId ,CENTER_NAME AS centerName FROM spb.TB_OPR_CENTER WHERE CENTER_CLS_CD = 'CEN_003' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT ADMIN_ID AS usrId ,ADMIN_NAME AS usrName FROM spb.TB_SYS_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_GRP_SEQ in (SELECT ADMIN_GRP_SEQ FROM spb.TB_SYS_GRP_CD WHERE ADMIN_CLS_CD = CONCAT('ADM_' ,#{usrGrpCd}) )
AND ADMIN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('', #{usrName}, '%')
AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT ADMIN_ID AS usrId ,ADMIN_NAME AS usrName FROM spb.TB_SYS_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_GRP_SEQ in ( SELECT ADMIN_GRP_SEQ FROM spb.TB_SYS_GRP_CD WHERE ADMIN_CLS_CD = CONCAT('ADM_' ,#{usrGrpCd}) AND ADMIN_GRP_SEQ='21' )
AND ADMIN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('', #{usrName}, '%')
AND USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT PENALTY_CD AS penaltyCd ,PENALTY_NAME AS penaltyName ,PENALTY_POINT AS penaltyPoint FROM spb.TB_SVC_PENALTY_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY PENALTY_NAME

SELECT BRKDN_STUS_CD as faultCode FROM TB_MTC_REPORT_DETL WHERE FAULT_SEQ = #{faultSeq} UNION ALL SELECT B.BRKDN_STUS_CD FROM TB_MTC_CHECK_INFO A, TB_MTC_CHECK_DETL B , TB_MTC_FAULT_INFO C, TB_SVC_MB D WHERE A.READ_CLS_CD = 'S' AND A.FAULT_SEQ = B.FAULT_SEQ AND A.EQUIPMENT_ID = C.EQUIPMENT_ID AND C.FAULT_SEQ = #{faultSeq} AND C.MOD_ID = D.MB_ID AND D.USR_SEQ = A.USR_SEQ
